752040.name: Univers
752040.description:
Survival in space, you wake up after a long sleep on a deck of a huge interstellar ship stranded in the vast void of space. Discover what has happened and face the many challenges that this place will offer you. Repair the damage to the ship to survive, manufacture and investigate each sector to collect information about how to carry out this task, be cautious, we do not know if there is someone or something else on board ...

I'm studying the possibility of adding cooperative mode or making it multiplayer online, but I promise nothing (possibility).



- Repair and restore energy.
- Survive.
- Discover and investigate all parts of the ship.
- Make resources, objects that can be useful.
- Explore space (possibility).
752040.supported_languages:
英语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
